messages.content: You shouldn't be so hard on yourself. Just relax, take a deep breath, let the blood flow. Everything's going to be fine.
2-4 minutes is not enough time to wash long hair. 10-15 minutes minimum. Stay strong!
Dude, its **life** it's not **trauma**. Grow up
End this relationship NOW. And please learn from it!!
I’m having a counseling this weekend ... nothing to be scared.... just tell them about your feelings and what are you worrying about..
good luck! I wish you the best <33
You got the true ending don't worry, you would only get the bad ending if you rat out your friends or accepted the deal
I’m glad you had a great time here! Wishing you safe travels!
No doubt would start at wing. We need help there and it would help ease him in
Just keep it. You’re going to go through more brain damage than it’s worth.
You have to live for you. Go get that education, go get that career. Rediscover yourself.
Hi, [NAME]! I thought I would stop by and wish you a wonderful and prosperous year! Have a good one! -HappyFriendlyBot
You will have symptoms for a few more weeks while it kicks in, good luck, glad to see youre doing better
All I can say is.. good luck bro
You’re a life saver, wish you a blessed new year
Look on the bright side, you might never need to worry about that ever again.
There’s no evidence that 12-step programs work any better than no program, so you’re not missing anything if you quit. Good luck.
